snippet.textDisplay: Is this possible to sort files and folders automatically? Like in windows? In mac every time I create a new folder I have to sort it. Can’t it be sorted automatically like it happens in windows? This is very frustrating and time consuming process to sort again and again.
snippet.textOriginal: Is this possible to sort files and folders automatically? Like in windows? In mac every time I create a new folder I have to sort it. Can’t it be sorted automatically like it happens in windows? This is very frustrating and time consuming process to sort again and again.
